page.title: 03PWLLHELI ROCK & FUNFAIR
page.content:
{THE PWLLHEILI ROCK BUSINESS The Barma family have made and sold {Pwllheli Rock }since 1946.They have several shops and run the largest stall in our market.They sell 25 sorts of rock.These can look like fruits, lollies,dummies,bacon and egg and even false teeth! On Wednesdays they sell about 3000 sticks,-mint rock being the most popular.
{THE PWLLHELI FUNFAIR The Studt and Kibblewhite families from South Wales,have been involved with funfairs for generations.They own the{Pwllheli Funland}which is open 7 days a week from April to September. There are ten attractions,ranging in price from 20p to 50p.The Fun Fair, Roller Coaster,Helter Skelter and Dodgems are the most popular attractions.
